Page Description Camera Inspector window reference Reference for the Camera component Inspector A Unity window that displays information about the currently selected GameObject, asset or project settings, allowing you to inspect and edit the values. More info See in Glossary window. Physical Camera Inspector window reference Reference for the Physical Camera component Inspector window.

Additional resources Cameras A component which creates an image of a particular viewpoint in your scene. The output is either drawn to the screen or captured as a texture.
